00097 char testName[100], fileName[100];
00098 
00102 #define NUM_THREADS   8
00103 
00104 // @brief Scratch memory for storing line from parameter file
00105 char sLineTest[MAX_LINE_LEN];
00106 // @brief Scratch memory for storing name
00107 char paramStTest[MAX_LINE_LEN];
00108 
00109 // ****************************************************************************************
00110 #ifdef _OPENMP
00111 void main(int argc, char *argv[])
00112 #else
00113 void testLoop(void)
00114 #endif
00115 {
00116   FILE *fpTestList, *fpTestOut, *fpTest;
00117   char *pSLine = &sLineTest[0];
00118   char *pParamStr = &paramStTest[0];
00119   int nthreads;
00120   ParamsBlas3_t params;
00121 
00122 #if defined(DMA_COPYA) || defined(DMA_COPYB)
00123   EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaResult;
00124   // initialize EDMA
00125   edmaResult = edmaInit();
00126   if(edmaResult != EDMA3_DRV_SOK)
00127   {
00128         System_printf("Failed to allocate DMA resources\n");
00129         System_abort("\n");
00130   }
00131 #endif
00132 
00133   // test list file
00134 #ifdef VERIFICATION
00135 #ifdef _OPENMP
00136   fpTestList = fopen("..\\..\\..\\blas3_param_verification_omp.txt","rt");
00137 #else
00138   fpTestList = fopen("..\\..\\..\\blas3_param_verification.txt","rt");
00139 #endif
00140 #else
00141 #ifdef _OPENMP
00142   fpTestList = fopen("..\\..\\..\\blas3_param_performance_omp.txt","rt");
00143 #else
00144   fpTestList = fopen("..\\..\\..\\blas3_param_performance.txt","rt");
00145 #endif
00146 #endif
00147   if(fpTestList == NULL)
00148   {
00149         System_printf("Cannot open input test list file");
00150         System_abort("\n");
00151   }
00152 
00153   fgets(pSLine, MAX_LINE_LEN, fpTestList);
00154   sscanf(pSLine,"%s",pParamStr);
00155   if(strcmp(pParamStr,"nthreads") == 0)
00156   { // first line is nthreads indicating number of threads
00157         sscanf(pSLine,"%s %d", pParamStr, &nthreads);
00158   }
00159   else
00160   { // nthreads not defined in file
00161         nthreads = NUM_THREADS;
00162     rewind(fpTestList);
00163   }
00164 
00165 #ifdef _OPENMP
00166   omp_set_num_threads(nthreads);
00167 #endif
00168 
00169   // loop over test cases defined
00170   while (! feof(fpTestList)) // for all listed in test list file
00171   {
00172 
00173         // open the list of tests
00174         fscanf(fpTestList,"%s\n",testName);
00175         sprintf(fileName,"..\\..\\..\\params\\blas3_param_%s.txt",testName);
00176         // now open the individual test list
00177         fpTest = fopen(fileName,"rt");
00178         if(fpTest == NULL)
00179         {
00180           System_printf("Cannot open input test file: %s; skipping test....\n", fileName);
00181           continue;
00182         }
00183         sprintf(fileName,"..\\..\\..\\params\\blas3_results_%s.txt",testName);
00184         fpTestOut = fopen(fileName,"wt");
00185         if(fpTestOut == NULL)
00186         {
00187           System_printf("Cannot open output file: %s; skipping test....\n", fileName);
00188           continue;
00189         }
00190         while (! feof(fpTest)) // for all listed in test list file
00191         {
00192           double gFlops, err;
00193 
00194       readAPIparams(fpTest, &params);
00195       if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"sgemm") == 0)
00196       {
00197         testSgemm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00198       }
00199       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"dgemm") == 0)
00200       {
00201         testDgemm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00202       }
00203       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"cgemm") == 0)
00204       {
00205         testCgemm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00206         gFlops *= 4.0;
00207       }
00208       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zgemm") == 0)
00209       {
00210         testZgemm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00211         gFlops *= 4.0;
00212       }
00213       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ssymm") == 0)
00214       {
00215         testSsymm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00216       }
00217       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"dsymm") == 0)
00218       {
00219         testDsymm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00220       }
00221       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"csymm") == 0)
00222       {
00223         testCsymm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00224         gFlops *= 4.0;
00225       }
00226       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zsymm") == 0)
00227       {
00228         testZsymm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00229         gFlops *= 4.0;
00230       }
00231       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"chemm") == 0)
00232       {
00233         testChemm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00234         gFlops *= 4.0;
00235       }
00236       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zhemm") == 0)
00237       {
00238         testZhemm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00239         gFlops *= 4.0;
00240       }
00241       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ssyrk") == 0)
00242       {
00243         testSsyrk(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00244       }
00245       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"dsyrk") == 0)
00246       {
00247         testDsyrk(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00248       }
00249       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"csyrk") == 0)
00250       {
00251         testCsyrk(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00252         gFlops *= 4.0;
00253       }
00254       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zsyrk") == 0)
00255       {
00256         testZsyrk(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00257         gFlops *= 4.0;
00258       }
00259       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"cherk") == 0)
00260       {
00261         testCherk(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00262         gFlops *= 4.0;
00263       }
00264       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zherk") == 0)
00265       {
00266         testZherk(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00267         gFlops *= 4.0;
00268       }
00269       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ssyr2k") == 0)
00270       {
00271         testSsyr2k(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00272       }
00273       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"dsyr2k") == 0)
00274       {
00275         testDsyr2k(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00276       }
00277       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"csyr2k") == 0)
00278       {
00279         testCsyr2k(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00280         gFlops *= 4.0;
00281       }
00282       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zsyr2k") == 0)
00283       {
00284         testZsyr2k(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00285         gFlops *= 4.0;
00286       }
00287       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"cher2k") == 0)
00288       {
00289         testCher2k(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00290         gFlops *= 4.0;
00291       }
00292       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"zher2k") == 0)
00293       {
00294         testZher2k(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00295         gFlops *= 4.0;
00296       }
00297       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"strmm") == 0)
00298       {
00299         testStrmm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00300       }
00301       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"dtrmm") == 0)
00302       {
00303         testDtrmm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00304       }
00305       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ctrmm") == 0)
00306       {
00307         testCtrmm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00308         gFlops *= 4.0;
00309       }
00310       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ztrmm") == 0)
00311       {
00312         testZtrmm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00313         gFlops *= 4.0;
00314       }
00315       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"strsm") == 0)
00316       {
00317         testStrsm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00318       }
00319       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"dtrsm") == 0)
00320       {
00321         testDtrsm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00322       }
00323       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ctrsm") == 0)
00324       {
00325         testCtrsm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00326         gFlops *= 4.0;
00327       }
00328       else if (strcmp(params.blas3Api,"ztrsm") == 0)
00329       {
00330         testZtrsm(&params, &gFlops, &err);
00331         gFlops *= 4.0;
00332       }
00333       else
00334       {
00335         continue;
00336       }
00337 #ifdef VERIFICATION
00338       fprintf(fpTestOut,"%e ", err);
00339       printf("max abs error = %e\n", err);
00340 #endif
00341 #ifdef PROFILE_CYCLES
00342       fprintf(fpTestOut,"%f ", gFlops);
00343       System_printf("GFLOPS (1 GHz core) = %f\n", gFlops);
00344 #endif
00345       writeAPIparams(fpTestOut, &params);
00346       fflush(fpTestOut);
00347         }
00348         fclose(fpTest);
00349     fclose(fpTestOut);
00350   }
00351   fclose(fpTestList);
00352 
00353 #if defined(DMA_COPYA) || defined(DMA_COPYB)
00354   edmaClose();
00355 #endif
00356   System_printf("Test End\n\n");
00357 #ifndef _OPENMP
00358   BIOS_exit(0);
00359 #endif
00360 } // main()
00361 
00362 #ifndef _OPENMP
00363 
00364 // start BIOS manually for non OPENMP mode
00365 Void main(Int argc, String argv[])
00366 {
00367   Thread_Params threadParams;
00368 
00369   // start main test thread
00370   Thread_Params_init(&threadParams);
00371   threadParams.stackSize = 24 * 1024;
00372   threadParams.instance->name = mainStart;
00373   threadParams.priority = xdc_runtime_knl_Thread_Priority_BELOW_NORMAL;
00374   if(Thread_create((Thread_RunFxn) testLoop, &threadParams, NULL) == NULL)
00375   {
00376     System_abort("main: failed to create MidEnd_control thread.");
00377   }
00378 
00379   BIOS_start();
00380 }
00381 
00382 #include <ti/csl/csl_xmcAux.h>
00383 #include <ti/csl/csl_cacheAux.h>
00384 #define MPAX_INDEX 3
00385 
00386 // system initialization for non OPENMP case
00387 // initialize L1 cache and non cache MSMCSRAM like opneMP
00388 void initSystem(void)
00389 {
00390   CSL_XMC_XMPAXH mpaxh;
00391   CSL_XMC_XMPAXL mpaxl;
00392 
00393   // first set cache size
00394   CACHE_wbInvAllL1d(CACHE_WAIT);
00395   CACHE_setL1DSize (CACHE_L1_16KCACHE);
00396 
00397   // now shadow MSMCSRAM
00398   CSL_XMC_getXMPAXL (MPAX_INDEX, &mpaxl);
00399   CSL_XMC_getXMPAXH (MPAX_INDEX, &mpaxh);
00400 
00401   mpaxh.segSize = 0x15;
00402   mpaxh.bAddr = 0xA0000;
00403 
00404   CSL_XMC_setXMPAXH (MPAX_INDEX, &mpaxh);
00405 
00406   mpaxl.ux = 1;
00407   mpaxl.uw = 1;
00408   mpaxl.ur = 1;
00409   mpaxl.sx = 1;
00410   mpaxl.sw = 1;
00411   mpaxl.sr = 1;
00412   mpaxl.rAddr = 0x00C000;
00413 
00414   CSL_XMC_setXMPAXL (MPAX_INDEX, &mpaxl);
00415 
00416 }
00417 
00418 // define some OMP functions interfaces
00419 // in non-OMP mode
00420 int omp_get_thread_num(void)
00421 {
00422   return 0;
00423 }
00424 
00425 #else
00426 
00427 #include <ti/csl/csl_cacheAux.h>
00428 
00429 // initialize L1 cache;
00430 void initSystem(void)
00431 {
00432           // first set cache size
00433           CACHE_wbInvAllL1d(CACHE_WAIT);
00434           CACHE_setL1DSize (CACHE_L1_16KCACHE);
00435 
00436 }
00437 #endif
